abstract: Defunct Trump University, subject of Sen Marco Rubio's attacks on Donald J Trump in 10th Republican presidential debate, is focus of three pending legal cases; New York State has filed suit against Trump for misrepresentation, and students of Trump University seminars have filed two similar class-action suits against Trump in California.

headline.print_headline: Checkered Past of Now-Defunct Trump University Comes Back to Haunt Candidate
headline.main: Trump University’s Checkered Past Haunting Candidate

snippet: The now-defunct Trump University, subject of a Marco Rubio attack at the Republican debate, is embroiled in lawsuits accusing it of misrepresentation.
lead_paragraph: The now-defunct Trump University, subject of a Marco Rubio attack at the Republican debate, is embroiled in lawsuits accusing it of misrepresentation.
